title: How to Fold Strawberry Origami

steps.headline: Make sure that the sheet is double sided - one green side and one red side.
steps.description: Check if you have the right origami paper.

steps.headline: Fold one corner diagonally to the another.
Take one corner on the creased side and fold it to the other corner on the same side.
Lift one side of the triangle and open up the triangle so it creates a diamond-like shape.
Turn over paper and repeat the previous step.
Turn the diamond-shaped origami paper around so that the opened folds are at the top and the closed corner is at the bottom.
Fold one side of the diamond into the middle.
steps.description: Do the same for the parallel side.

steps.headline: Unfold the kite-shaped origami paper.
steps.description: It should look like a diamond with the open ends at the top.

steps.headline: Put your index finger into the open end and slightly lift up one of the corners.
steps.description: Fold the side corner inward. Do the same for the parallel side.

steps.headline: Turn the folded origami over and repeat the process on this side as well.
Fold the side of the top of one corner of the kite-shaped origami towards the middle.
steps.description: Do the same for the parallel side, as well as the other three sides.

steps.headline: Lift the top of the kite-shaped origami and fold it downward.
steps.description: Crease the fold. Repeat for all sides.

steps.headline: Flip the origami to the sides that are fully red.
Fold the upper corner to the middle.
steps.description: Create a minor fold, not one that will extend to the side corner. Repeat for the other three sides.

steps.headline: Fold two sides together so that the minor folds are inside and the leaves are at each corner.
Blow into the hole that is at the top of the leaves.
Refer to the image to see the final product.

text: Make sure that the sheet is double sided - one green side and one red side. Check if you have the right origami paper. Lay the green side up.  Fold one corner diagonally to the another. Crease the fold. Take one corner on the creased side and fold it to the other corner on the same side. Crease the sides. Lift one side of the triangle and open up the triangle so it creates a diamond-like shape. Crease the sides. Turn over paper and repeat the previous step. Remember to crease the sides. Turn the diamond-shaped origami paper around so that the opened folds are at the top and the closed corner is at the bottom.  Fold one side of the diamond into the middle. Do the same for the parallel side. Unfold the kite-shaped origami paper. It should look like a diamond with the open ends at the top. Put your index finger into the open end and slightly lift up one of the corners. Fold the side corner inward. Do the same for the parallel side. Turn the folded origami over and repeat the process on this side as well.  Fold the side of the top of one corner of the kite-shaped origami towards the middle. Do the same for the parallel side, as well as the other three sides. Lift the top of the kite-shaped origami and fold it downward. Crease the fold. Repeat for all sides. Flip the origami to the sides that are fully red.  Fold the upper corner to the middle. Create a minor fold, not one that will extend to the side corner. Repeat for the other three sides. Fold two sides together so that the minor folds are inside and the leaves are at each corner.  Blow into the hole that is at the top of the leaves.  Refer to the image to see the final product.
sentences: Make sure that the sheet is double sided - one green side and one red side.
Check if you have the right origami paper.
Lay the green side up.
Fold one corner diagonally to the another.
Crease the fold.
Take one corner on the creased side and fold it to the other corner on the same side.
Crease the sides.
Lift one side of the triangle and open up the triangle so it creates a diamond-like shape.
Crease the sides.
Turn over paper and repeat the previous step.
Remember to crease the sides.
Turn the diamond-shaped origami paper around so that the opened folds are at the top and the closed corner is at the bottom.
Fold one side of the diamond into the middle.
Do the same for the parallel side.
Unfold the kite-shaped origami paper.
It should look like a diamond with the open ends at the top.
Put your index finger into the open end and slightly lift up one of the corners.
Fold the side corner inward.
Do the same for the parallel side.
Turn the folded origami over and repeat the process on this side as well.
Fold the side of the top of one corner of the kite-shaped origami towards the middle.
Do the same for the parallel side, as well as the other three sides.
Lift the top of the kite-shaped origami and fold it downward.
Crease the fold.
Repeat for all sides.
Flip the origami to the sides that are fully red.
Fold the upper corner to the middle.
Create a minor fold, not one that will extend to the side corner.
Repeat for the other three sides.
Fold two sides together so that the minor folds are inside and the leaves are at each corner.
Blow into the hole that is at the top of the leaves.
Refer to the image to see the final product.
tyn_section: Double-sided Origami Paper (One side: Green-colored, Other side: Red-colored with black dots)
